II delivers with more tongue-in-cheek humor than the first series. In \"The Rolling Colony Affair,\" a colony is hosting a cabaret show featuring the girls of Gundam. But the show turns disastrous when men and mobile suits go crazy over the girls, sending the colony rolling out of control. But why can't they use their superpowers? Do they really have superpowers in the first place?  2. \"1+1\" (30min, 1+1) by Han Jay\r \"Toot! I'm 1+1!\" One day, the same alter ego as me appeared!  3. \"Jangah \u0026 Chichung\" (35min, 장아치청, jang-a-chi-cheong) by Kim Tae-hoon-II\r \"Burp!\" Once you start burping, there's nothing you can do. A comedy action movie limited to 60 minutes, filled with real superpowers by superheroes.  4. \"LOVE SICK\" (23min, 러브씩, reo-beu-ssik) by Jung Seung-hoon\r A year after the end of the zombie crisis, Seung-beom prepares an unforgettable proposal for his girlfriend Ji-yoon who saved him.","poster_path":"/6o2bebPFlGEw2Ql1IYz1wT29utl.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ko","genre_ids":[28,35,18,14],"popularity":4.689,"release_date":"2022-06-30","video":false,"vote_average":7.4,"vote_count":33},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":513573,"title":"Mobile Suit SD Gundam Mk IV","original_title":"機動戦士SDガンダム Mk-IV","overview":"The SD Gundams are at it again: first with a race among all of the prior SD Gundam characters, then the SD Zeons run a space travel agency in the second episode.","poster_path":"/wOPpoJ17afefYVjBHuey6j2R8AE.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ja","genre_ids":[16,28,35,878],"popularity":4.367,"release_date":"1990-09-25","video":false,"vote_average":4.435,"vote_count":23},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":508108,"title":"Mobile Suit SD Gundam","original_title":"機動戦士SDガンダム","overview":"A collection of short parodies of the Mobile Suit Gundam saga.
